column1: At an unknown date, [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
*'''Contents:''' Tolkien denies any influence from the writings of [[wikipedia:Edgar Rice Burroughs
column2: Edgar Rice Burroughs]] on the creation of [[Shelob]].

column1: *'''Publication:''' A brief extract from the letter was published in ''[[Edgar Rice Burroughs: Master of Adventure]]'' (written by Richard Lupoff) and in ''[[Tolkien Criticism: An Annotated Checklist]]''. Part of the extract was reprinted in [[Orcrist 4
